Computer Vision

  1. FFT

    Using java to achieve non-recursive FFT, Apply circle filter and butter-flow filter to remove different kinds of noise.

  2. Crowd Counting

    Using matlab to extract crowd features and train a model, Apply the model to predict the density map.

  3. Interested Point

    Detect Harris Corner on two photos contain same object but with different perspective.

  4. Object Tracking

    Tracking objects by matching the interested points in each frame.
